text: Drake Hotel may refer to: ;in Canada *Drake Hotel (Toronto), Ontario ;in the United States (by state) *Drake Hotel (Chicago, Illinois), listed on the National Register of Historic Places (NRHP) *Drake Hotel (Gallup, New Mexico), NRHP-listed in McKinley County *Drake Hotel (New York City), New York *Drake Hotel (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania), NRHP-listed
title: Drake Hotel
